channel.title: These inside forums in general
channel.description:
staff that have not contributed to runescape cheating should not have access. moderators dont have access to the moparscape vet section, why the hell do they have access to this?
in the past year and a bit, people have been gaining the title of community member by means of farming rep or for things unrelated to runescape cheating. this should require a rework of the system. a few ideas i have are: -make access to these sections unrelated to rank in the community, ie cm without access/access without cm -make community member status unrelated to reputation -add negative reputation so that people can be punished for stupid things
the inside forums are explicitly for rs cheating, why should you gain access for anything else but providing for rs cheating? i have no interest releasing anything here while idiots have access
ps why are algas and waffendennis still admin pps give me my fkn gold bars

item.title: These inside forums in general
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:21, topic:300659”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=396920.msg2947829#msg2947829 date=1252302987]

i have no interest releasing anything here while idiots have access

I’m not disagreeing with you, but I want to ask “why?” What exactly is it about staff members/idiots seeing what you post, that you do not like?

I mean it’s not like we are going to leak your information.
[/quote]my primary concern would be lack of quality feedback

Fair enough. You are right, I couldn’t give you quality feedback.[/quote]
Yeah, like there’s much to criticize… :rolleyes:

Read full topic

I’ve been a cc almost since this forum opened Only because staff way later

contributes gold bars

item.title: These inside forums in general
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:22, topic:300659”]Frank_, contrary to your belief you aren’t better than anyone else. Treat others with respect or I’ll ban you.[/quote]sorry for my outburst, i just assumed global moderators could read

Read full topic

item.title: These inside forums in general
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:13, topic:300659”][quote author=Tico link=topic=396920.msg2947809#msg2947809 date=1252301510]
To be quite honest, I don’t use these boards anyways, and I don’t think any other gmods even use it. That being said, I wouldn’t mind my access from it being provoked. However, I will say that I was under the impression that staff members were considered community contributors, as they had contributed their time to moderating the site. Either way, it truly doesn’t matter to me.
[/quote]read the first post and fuck off[/quote]

Speaking of quality feedback…
Frank_, contrary to your belief you aren’t better than anyone else. Treat others with respect or I’ll ban you.

I’ll try to set up this system later tonight.

Read full topic

item.title: These inside forums in general
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

jme:

Well tico it’s called “community contributors” which is a bit misleading, the point of it really is “runescape cheating contributors”

I was under that impression from another staff member.

[quote=“frank_, post:13, topic:300659”][quote author=Tico link=topic=396920.msg2947809#msg2947809 date=1252301510]
To be quite honest, I don’t use these boards anyways, and I don’t think any other gmods even use it. That being said, I wouldn’t mind my access from it being provoked. However, I will say that I was under the impression that staff members were considered community contributors, as they had contributed their time to moderating the site. Either way, it truly doesn’t matter to me.
[/quote]read the first post and fuck off[/quote]

I think that’s rather rude; obviously I was one of the reasons you posted it, but after all I am agreeing with you - I see absolutely no need for that.

Read full topic
